DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify 1 or more doses of daclatasvir, which when used in combination with pegylated interferon alpha and ribavirin, are safe and demonstrate sufficient anti-hepatitis C virus activity.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Daclatasvir (BMS-790052) Plus Standard of Care (Pegylated-interferon Alpha and Ribavirin)
